*Infectra sits down on the ground* Infectra: I hope so too. *Infectra says =
back to Airbomber and than sighs*
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: T=
HECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, July 16, 2000 5:03 AM
  S=
ubject: Neo Beast Wars


  Dracona walks up to the Predacon (Megatron's) ba=
se and looks at it. It didn't notice her, so she went closer and inspected =
it. She looked around it, making notes of certain things.

  Plintissa foll=
owed Artist out in the missle of no where in a desert. Artist turned around=
 and looked at Plintissa.

  "Plintissa now see Artist's secret treasure!" =
Artist said. He smiled. Plintissa was stunned. Artist dug a little in the s=
and, and brought up a hermit crab shell. Artist laughed and ran off laughin=
g giddily. Plintissa sighed and turned back. No wait, maybe this way was ba=
ck. No wait, that way. Plintissa realized she was lost, and that Artist was=
 nowhere to be found. She looked around from left to right. Oh, what was th=
e use, she might as well be dead out on the desert anyhow, she obviously wa=
sn't needed, not even Dracona stuck around with her! She had thought that I=
ron Raptor was her friend, but that blew up in her face. Then she made the =
mistake of trusting some bot sho said he would help her, and then she went =
off and nobody trusted her any longer. Plintissa walked off into the distan=
ce, hoping to find her way home. Then it occured to her. She didn't have a =
home. a single tear fell from Plintissa's eye and she walked on.

  Artist =
ran off into the distance and looked back joyfully. Plintissa wasn't there.=


  "Yikes! I was supposed to protect her!" Artist said. He ran back into t=
he desert, darting quickly mile for mile, trying to find Plintissa.

  Gang=
on's spark glowed eerily and bumped into BrightBlade's hand.

  Sinesis and=
 Sinister lay there, half dead with Sinister in pieces.

  Deemos figures o=
ut that this disgusting team must not be right for him and he runs off, hop=
ing maybe the Maximals would be good enough to let him and his wife join an=
d heal up. He ran along, going quickly, about 2 hours later he found the Ma=
ximal base. Inzola was in his arms in stasis lock and spitting out blood, s=
he was bleeding internally. Deemos whimpered and aproached the Maximal base=
.

  "Attention! Maximals! I wish to join you, as does my wife and cohort, =
Inzola! Let me it, Inzola is in critical condition!" Deemos said.

  The Ra=
dicons ceased their walk and sat down in a forest. Airbomber sighed.

  "Fo=
od would be good about now." Train Wreck said. Arrow smiled.

  "Wait here,=
 I'll go get something!" Arrow said. He went running off. Blender and Stron=
ghold shrugged, Stronghold staring into the distance and Blender scanning t=
he area. Stranato and Train Wreck look at each other and gulp. Arrow must b=
e their chef now.

  "I hope you like what Arrow makes." Airbomber said to =
Infectra. (If she's there.)

----------------------------------------------=
--------------------------------

---------------------------------------
